1.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Rachel is introducing Phoebe, who is playing her guitar for theNEWLINEcrowd.

lines.Line: Everybody? Shh, shhh. Uhhh... Central Perk is proud to present the musicNEWLINEof Miss Phoebe Buffay

Hi. Um, I want to start with a song thats about that moment when youNEWLINEsuddenly realize what life is all about. OK, here we go. (plays a chord, then the lightsNEWLINEgo out) OK, thank you very much

lines.Line: Wow, this is so cool, you guys. The entire city is blacked out
Mom says it's all of Manhattan, parts of Brooklyn and Queens, and theyNEWLINEhave no idea when it's coming back on
Wow, you guys, this is big
Wow, you guys, this is big
Wow, you guys, this is big

lines.Line: And officiating at tonight's blackout, is Rabbi Tribbiani

lines.Character: (They all look at the window, grossed out, then flinch in pain

4.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, The phone rings; it's Chandler.

lines.Line: (to everyone) It's Chandler! (on phone) Are you OK
Yeah, I'm fine. (trying to cover up what he is saying) I'm trppd in anNEWLINEATM vstbl wth Jll Gdcr
I'm trppd... in an ATM vstbl... wth Jll Gdcr
I have no idea what you just said
I have no idea what you just said
I'm trppd... in an ATM vstbl... wth JLL GDCR
(to everyone) Oh my God! He's trapped in an ATM vestibule with JillNEWLINEGoodacre! (on phone) Chandler, listen. (says something intentionally garbled
Yeah, like that thought never entered my mind
Yeah, like that thought never entered my mind
Yeah, like that thought never entered my mind
Oh, then no thanks. <i>What the hell was that? Mental note: If JillNEWLINEGoodacre offers you gum, you take it. If she offers you mangled animal carcass, you takeNEWLINEit.</i

6.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's Balcony, Ross and Rachel are talking.

lines.Line: OK, I have a question. Well, actually, it's not so much a question as..NEWLINEmore of a general wondering... ment
OK. Here goes. For a while now, I've been wanting to, um...
Oh, look at the little cat! (a small kitten is on the roof behind Ross
What? (the cat jumps on his shoulders) Ow
What? (the cat jumps on his shoulders) Ow

lines.Character: [Cut to inside. Monica, Joey and Phoebe are singing while outside, Ross and Rachel areNEWLINEtrying to get the cat off of Ross' shoulder
lines.Line: Cut to inside. Monica, Joey and Phoebe are singing while outside, Ross and Rachel areNEWLINEtrying to get the cat off of Ross' shoulder.
(singing) <i>I'm on top of the world,NEWLINElooking down on creation and the only explanation I can find, is the wonders I've foundNEWLINEever since...</i

You know, on second thought, gum would be perfection. (Jill gives himNEWLINEa stick of gum, and a strange look) <i>'Gum would be perfection'? 'Gum would beNEWLINEperfection.' Could have said 'gum would be nice,' or 'I'll have a stick,' but no, no, no,NEWLINEno. For me, gum is perfection. I loathe myself.</i

8.SceneDescription: Rachel has gone off on her own to look for the cat's owner.

lines.Line: Here, kitty-kitty. Here kitty-kitty. Where did you go, littleNEWLINEkitty-kitty-kitty? Here kitty-kitty-kitty-kitty..

lines.Character: (While looking at the floor for the cat, Rachel runs into a pair of legs. She slowlyNEWLINEgets up and sees a gorgeous Italian hunk holding the cat. Who, by the way, you'll hateNEWLINEvery, very soon. The man. Not the cat
lines.Line: While looking at the floor for the cat, Rachel runs into a pair of legs. She slowlyNEWLINEgets up and sees a gorgeous Italian hunk holding the cat. Who, by the way, you'll hateNEWLINEvery, very soon. The man. Not the cat.
Wow. (she exhales in amazement, blowing the candle out
(chewing gum) <i>Ah, let's see. What next? Blow a bubble. A bubble'sNEWLINEgood. It's got a... boyish charm, it's impish. Here we go.</i

lines.Character: (Chandler waits until Jill is looking, then starts to blow a bubble. But instead ofNEWLINEblow one, he accidentally spits the gum out of his mouth and hits the wall
lines.Line: Chandler waits until Jill is looking, then starts to blow a bubble. But instead ofNEWLINEblow one, he accidentally spits the gum out of his mouth and hits the wall.
Nice going, imp. OK, it's OK. All I need to do is reach over andNEWLINEput it in my mouth. (Chandler slyly grabs the gum from the wall and slides it back inNEWLINEhis mouth.
Good save! We're back on track, and I'm... (grimacing) ..chewingNEWLINEsomeone else's gum. This is not my gum. Oh my God! Oh my God! And now you'reNEWLINEchoking.

lines.Character: (Chandler tries to save face and makes the 'OK' sign with his hands, while obviouslyNEWLINEunable to breathe
lines.Line: Chandler tries to save face and makes the 'OK' sign with his hands, while obviouslyNEWLINEunable to breathe.
My God, you're choking! (she runs over and gives him the Heimlich, the gumNEWLINEflies from his mouth) That better
(gasping) Yes... thank you. That was... that was...
(gasping) Yes... thank you. That was... that was...

10.SceneDescription: ATM vestibule, Chandler and Jill are sitting below the counter with two pensNEWLINEdangling from their chains in front of them. Jill is showing Chandler how to swing the penNEWLINEaround his head.

lines.Line: Chandler, we've been here for an hour doing this! Now watch, it's easy
Ready? (she swings the pen around her head in a circle

lines.Character: (Chandler tries to do the same thing but the pen hits him in the head
lines.Line: Chandler tries to do the same thing but the pen hits him in the head.
No, you've got to whip it.
No, you've got to whip it.
No, you've got to whip it.

11.SceneDescription: ATM vestibule, the power has come back on.

lines.Line: Yes. Yes, thanks for letting me use your phone... and for saving myNEWLINElife
Well, goodbye Chandler. I had a great blackout. (she kisses him on theNEWLINEcheek) See ya

lines.Character: (She leaves. Chandler presses his face to the glass door after her, stroking the windowNEWLINElovingly. He then turns to the security camera and starts talking to it
lines.Line: She leaves. Chandler presses his face to the glass door after her, stroking the windowNEWLINElovingly. He then turns to the security camera and starts talking to it.
